title: Libraries event space request: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Please fill out the form below to request a space in the Libraries for an event. These spaces include large rooms like the Video Theater and tabling spaces in the University Library entrance. Please note: Deering Library will be temporarily closed beginning in June 2024 for a renovation.  We will be unable to accommodate event requests for Deering. Construction in Deering Library may create noise in Ver Steeg. Please submit your request at least five business days in advance of your event. See policies for special events in the libraries.
